name: Usha Uthup
description: '''Usha Iyer Uthup''' (born 8 November 1947) is an Indian singer known for her deep [[contralto]] voice and her versatility across genres and languages. A prominent figure in Indian music since the 1970s, she has received a [[Filmfare Award]], and was honoured by the [[Government of India]] with the [[Padma Shri]] in 2011 and the [[Padma Bhushan]] in 2024 for her contribution in the field of arts.
